its owner will receive a message, he will either be filled with water dropsy or with leprosy.

that city will be dispersed and it will not return to its place.

full_text: If a sheep rubs itself sexually against a pig – the man's house will be deserted.

that house will experience good fortune.

full_text: If a sheep mounts sexually a white doeling – discord in the land.

apodosis: discord in the land.
options: its owner will shine.
equals will sell the house of their father for silver.
discord in the land.

full_text: If the rams skip persistently – peace in the heart of the city.
